description: Largest even number a(n) such that 6,8,...,a(n) are sums of 2 of first n odd primes.
formula: a(n) << n log n. - _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Sep 19 2012More specifically, a(n) <= 2*prime(n+1). On the Goldbach conjecture a(n) >= prime(n+1) + 3. - _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Dec 09 2014
author: R. Muller
